Room.Name: Dark and Cloudy Skies
Room.ShortDescription: Ooops. You've flown into a cloud and lost your directions.
Room.LongDescription: You can turn left or right, or even fly forward, but the trouble is, if you turn left or right for too long, you start to go in circles. And if you fly forward, how can you tell how much drift is occuring? Flying blind is a terrible way to try to get anywhere.
